body:
Very minor holiday update, but just an early joy for the upcoming holiday. It hasn't been directly addressed on the server, but we added turkey to all the spawnkits (every map that has food is now turkey). 



Join a match and chew some up! :3
Happy thanksgiving from the mapdevs. We may have more tricks up our sleeve!
body_tagged:
